gurmukhi: ਜਬ ਤੇ ਪਰਮ ਗੁਰ ਚਰਨ ਸਰਨਿ ਅਾੲੇ ਚਰਨ ਸਰਨਿ ਲਿਵ ਸਕਲ ਸੰਸਾਰ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jab Tay Param Gur Charan Sarani Aaay , Charan Sarani Liv Sakal Sansaar Hai ?
translation: Since the time a human being takes the refuge in the holy feet of the True Guru, the people of the world then start contemplating in the refuge of his feet.

gurmukhi: ਚਰਨ ਕਮਲ ਮਕਰੰਦ ਚਰਨਾਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਕੈ ਚਾਹਤ ਚਰਨ ਰੇਨ ਸਕਲ ਅਕਾਰ ਹੈ
transliteration: Charan Kamal Makarand Charanaamrit Kai , Chaahat Charan Rayn Sakal Akaar Hai ?
translation: By taking the foot-wash of the True Guru while staying in His refuge, the entire mankind desires to be blessed by his holy feet.

gurmukhi: ਚਰਨ ਕਮਲ ਸੁਖ ਸੰਪਟ ਸਹਜ ਘਰਿ ਨਿਹਚਲ ਮਤਿ ਪਰਮਾਰਥ ਬੀਚਾਰ ਹੈ
transliteration: Charan Kamal Soukh Sanpat Sahaj Ghari , Nihachal Mati Paramaarad Beechaar Hai ?
translation: By living in the peaceful refuge of the lotus-like feet of the True Guru, one gets absorbed in a state of equipoise. Because of higher spiritual wisdom, they become stable of mind and consciousness.

gurmukhi: ਚਰਨ ਕਮਲ ਗੁਰ ਮਹਿਮਾ ਅਗਾਧਿ ਬੋਧਿ ਨੇਤਿ ਨੇਤਿ ਨਮੋ ਨਮੋ ਕੈ ਨਮਸਕਾਰ ਹੈ ||੨੧੭||
transliteration: Charan Kamal Gur Mahimaa Agaadhi Bodhi , Nayti Nayti Namo Namo Kai Namasakaar Hai ?217?
translation: The glory of the lotus-like feet of the True Guru is beyond comprehension, It is limitless, infinite. He is worthy of salutation again and again. (217)
